name: Cook Quest
description:
In Cook Quest you must drag the right ingredients on the pizza to complete orders and gain points before the time is up.

In this Arcade Game you must complete as much orders possible in a limited amount of time to gain points. Your goal is to be the first one in the leaderboard or just have fun and make pizzas.

The longer you play the harder the game gets. The orders will have more ingredients and the timer will deplete faster.

CONTROLS

LEFT CLICK + HOLD to grab ingredients.

DRAG ingredients on the pizza.

Tools used
  • Unity
  • Krita
Dream Team
  • Alexis Venchiarutti Itch.io - Twitter
  • Martin Joubert Itch.io

This game  was made for ScoreSpace Jam #12 a 3 days long jam.
